title: Minutes of Tainan City Government’s 466th Municipal Administrative Meeting Mayor’s remarks 11/23/2020
content: Mayor’s Remarks:Starting from now to the end of the year, various industrial, cultural, and business events will be held in Tainan. All bureaus should gear up, be prepared, and take measures concerning traffic control, environmental maintenance, and marketing and promotion. As vaccines are not yet available, preventive measures should be implemented to protect citizens’ health as the pandemic continues to spread.
